sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SASNEE, a town and fort of Hindustan, in the province of Agra, from which the zemindar was expelled, after a desperate resistance, by the British in 1803. It is thirty- eight miles north-north-east from the city of Agra. Long. 78. 4. E. Lat. 27. 45. N.
